gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Warriors 137, Grizzlies 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Warriors defeated the Grizzlies, 137-116. Jonathan Kuminga led Golden State with 26 points, five rebounds, and four assists as Klay Thompson (23 points) and Stephen Curry (14 points, four 3PM) added 37 points. GG Jackson led the Grizzlies with a career-high 35 points (seven 3PM), along with five rebounds, and three assists while Jaren Jackson (28 points) and Santi Aldama (27 points, nine rebounds) totaled 55 points. The Warriors improve to 36-32 as the Grizzlies move to 23-47. Memphis is eliminated from postseason contention with the loss.
